revision.text:
==External Links== [http://home.comcast.net/~shamblertm/ Download at the official website]
==Features== *Unlimited file storage and multiple file loading *Unlimited IWAD storage *Unlimited puke argument storage and multiple puke arg loading *Unlimited nameable user configurations *Summon(friend) class list *Can parse a decorate file and add any ACTORs to the summon(friend) list. (outdated, only works with older version DECORATE) *Saved game (.ZDS) PNG viewer *Includes almost all ZDoom command line args and a few console commands also *DMFLAGS and DMFLAGS2 calculator *Batch (.bat) file generator *Traditional calculator [[Category:Dead software]]
